summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposal of the Johnson Hicks Company to purchase and develop a parcel of land in the I-90 Redevelopment Project area; authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver contracts and deeds; authorizing the Department of Community Development Director to administer the "Contract for Sale of Land"; authorizing payment to the State of Washington of the purchase price owing; and designating the disposition of sale proceeds.
